snippet: John Crockett rushed for a career-high 227 yards and scored the winning touchdown to help host North Dakota State hold off Coastal Carolina, 39-32, in the Football Championship Subdivision quarterfinals.
abstract: Auburn hires Will Muschamp as defensive coordinator.
lead_paragraph: John Crockett rushed for a career-high 227 yards and scored the winning touchdown to help host North Dakota State hold off Coastal Carolina, 39-32, in the Football Championship Subdivision quarterfinals.

headline.main: North Dakota State Advances in F.C.S.
headline.print_headline: Auburn Hires Muschamp as a Coordinator
